articles.author: Alisha Sachdev
articles.title: Tata Sons to set up £4 bn battery factory in UK - Mint
articles.description: The cells will be utilized to supply to group companies Tata Motors and Jaguar Land Rover for their electric vehicles, as well as cater to renewable energy storage solutions for customers in Europe and the UK
articles.content: NEW DELHI : Tata Sons on Wednesday said it would invest £4 billion ($5.16 billion) to establish a new 40GW battery cell gigafactory in the UK. The cells will be utilized to supply to group companies … [+2139 chars]
